ctpMetaData.metaTitle: Best MBA Colleges in Maharashtra 2023: Rankings, Fees, Placements, Admission, Exams
ctpMetaData.bhstData:
There are a total of 743 best MBA colleges in Maharashtra. Among these, 475 colleges are privately owned, 37 colleges are owned by public/government organisations and public-private owns 21 MBA colleges. CAT, CMAT, MAH CET, MAT, XAT, and ATMA are some of the most accepting entrance exams in top MBA colleges in Maharashtra. NMIMS School of Business Management, Symbiosis Institute of Business Management, National Institute of Industrial Engineering, S.P. Jain Institute of Management and Research, K J Somaiya Institute of Management, etc. are some of the popular MBA colleges in Maharashtra.

The revised rankings of top MBA college in Maharashtra is mentioned below:

  • NITIE Bombay has improved its ranking as it shifted to rank 7 in 2023 when as compared to rank 9 in 2022.
  • SPJIMR has improved its ranking as it shifted to rank 20 in 2023 when as compared to rank 21 in 2022.

Best MBA Colleges in Maharashtra: Highlights 2023

An MBA is a 2-year postgraduate course that covers the fundamentals and advanced topics related to the management discipline. Some of the top MBA specialisations include Human Resources, Finance, Marketing, Organizational Behavior, Management Principles, and so on. An MBA degree can enhance an individual's skills and abilities and make them competent enough to work at managerial levels, thereby opening doors to countless career opportunities.

The key highlights related to MBA top colleges in Maharashtra are mentioned below:

Parameters

Particulars/Statistics

Number of MBA Colleges

743

Annual Fees

INR < 1 lakh: 57 colleges

INR 1-2 lakh: 228 colleges

INR 2-3 lakh: 95 colleges

INR 3-5 lakh: 69 colleges

INR > 5 lakh: 163 colleges

Top Specialisations

Finance, Human Resources, Sales and Marketing, Operations, Business Analytics, etc.

Accepted Entrance Exams

 CAT, XAT, CMAT, MAT, MAH CET, etc.

Predict your chances here: MBA 2023 Cutoff Predictor

How can I get admission to top MBA colleges in Maharashtra?

The general eligibility criteria to get MBA admission to top colleges for MBA in Maharashtra are listed below:

  • Candidates should have a bachelor's degree or equivalent qualification in any discipline from a recognised university or institution with a minimum of 50% aggregate.
  • Many MBA colleges in Maharashtra consider scores from national-level entrance exams such as MAH CET, CAT, GMAT, XAT, CMAT, or MAT. Candidates are required to meet the minimum cutoff scores set by the respective colleges.

What are the entrance exams for MBA colleges in Maharashtra?

The most popular entrance exams accepted by top colleges for MBA in Maharashtra are mentioned below:

  • MAH CET: Maharashtra Common Entrance Test or MAH CET is a management entrance test. Officially known as MAH MBA/MMS-CET, the exam is conducted by the State Common Entrance Test Cell, Maharashtra, for admission to MBA courses in various institutes in the state of Maharashtra. 
  • XAT: XAT(Xavier Aptitude Test) is a national-level management entrance examination conducted by XLRI, Jamshedpur for admission to MBA/PGDM programmes. XAT preparation needs at least six to nine months. Being one of the tougher MBA entrance exams among its peers, XAT requires dedicated time and effort.
  • CAT: Common Admission Test (CAT) is a national-level management aptitude test for admission to the MBAcourses offered by 20 IIMs and over 1,200 B-schools in India. CAT question paper is divided into three sections: Verbal Ability and Reading Comprehension, Data Interpretation and Logical Reasoning, and Quantitative Aptitude. The preparation for CAT exam should include phase-wise completion of the CAT syllabus, mock test practice, and revision.

Read More About Entrance Exam Accepting Colleges:

  • Top MBA Colleges Accepting CAT
  • Top MBA Colleges Accepting TANCET MBA
  • Top MBA Colleges Accepting XAT
  • Top MBA Colleges Accepting MAT

What is the No 1 MBA college in Maharashtra?

The NIRF (National Institutional Ranking Framework) ranking is an annual ranking system implemented by the Ministry of Education, Government of India. It aims to evaluate and rank higher education institutions in India based on various parameters such as teaching, learning, research, graduation outcomes, perception, and more. The NIRF rankings provide a comprehensive assessment of institutions across different disciplines, including MBA colleges.

What is the Average Fee of Best MBA Colleges in Maharashtra?

Return on Investment (ROI) shows how much profit or benefit you get if you pursue a course from a particular college. It assesses the return of the fee invested by the candidate while studying and the return he/she gets in the form of placements.

mainEntity.name: Which are the best colleges for MBA in Maharashtra?

acceptedAnswer.text: Colleges are ranked annually by the National Institutional Ranking Framework (NIRF). Based on factors such as Infrastructure, Placements, Faculty, and other aspects of the college or university's success, the ranking is determined and varies year. The top MBA Colleges in Maharashtra according to the NIRF rankings for 2021–2023 are displayed in the table below: College Name NIRF 2021 NIRF 2022 NIRF 2023 IIM Mumbai (formerly known as NITIE) 12 9 7 IIT Bombay 10 11 10 Symbiosis Institute of Business Management 20 17 17 SPJIMR 19 21 20 NMIMS 22 25 21 IIM, Nagpur 40 43 43 Welingkar Institute of Management 72 68 73 KJ Somaiya Institute of Management 56 71 45

mainEntity.name: How many colleges for MBA in Maharashtra?

acceptedAnswer.text: Maharashtra is home to 743 of the top MBA programs. Of these, 475 universities are privately held, 37 are owned by governmental or public entities, and 21 MBA colleges are controlled by a combination of public and private entities. The entrance examinations that top MBA schools in Maharashtra accept the most are CAT, CAT,6 MAH CET, MAT, XAT, and ATMA. Among the well-known MBA schools in Maharashtra are NMIMS School of Business Management, Symbiosis Institute of Business Management, National Institute of Industrial Engineering, S.P. Jain Institute of Management and Research, K J Somaiya Institute of Management, etc.

mainEntity.name: Which top MBA colleges in Maharashtra give admission through MAH CET?

acceptedAnswer.text: There are a total of 398 top MBA colleges in Maharashtra that give admission through MAH CET score. Out of which, some of them are mentioned below along with their total tuition costs: College Name Total Tuition Fee Pune Institute of Business Management INR 7 lakh - INR 8 lakh Jamnalal Bajaj Institute of Management Studies INR 6 lakh- INR 7 lakh Indira School of Business Studies INR 4 lakh- INR 7 lakh Neville Wadia Institute of Management Studies and Research INR 3 lakh- INR 4 lakh IIMS Pune INR 9 lakh

acceptedAnswer.text: The table below shows the top colleges for an MBA in Maharashtra along with their affordable fees of INR < 1 lakh: College Name Total Tuition Fee Welingkar Mumbai Admission INR 94,000 Indira Institute of Management Admission INR 30,000 Punyashlok Ahilyadevi Holkar Solapur University Admission INR 88,000 Department of Business Management- Nagpur University Admission INR 47,000 Dr. Babasaheb Ambedkar Marathwada University Admission INR 20,000 - INR 90,000

acceptedAnswer.text: The following table provides a comprehensive summary of the best MBA colleges in Maharashtra, together with the placement packages that these institutions offer to its graduates and the names of the major recruiters that were involved. College Name Annual Average Package Prominent Recruiters NMIMS School of Business Management Placements INR 7 LPA American Express, Axis Bank, EY, ITC, Wipro, etc. SIBM Pune Placements INR 21 LPA Fullerton, Kroll, Luminous, Aditya Birla Capital, EY, PwC, etc. IIM Mumbai (formerly known as NITIE) Placements INR 21 LPA – INR 31 LPA Capgemini, Coca-Cola, KPMG, Britannia, etc. SPJIMR Placements INR 25 LPA – INR 33 LPA Asian Paints, Godrej, HUL, Nestle, Castrol, etc. NMIMS Mumbai Placements INR 19 LPA Accenture, Adobe, Infosys, EY, etc.

mainEntity.name: What is the eligibility criteria to get admission to top MBA colleges in Maharashtra?

acceptedAnswer.text: The following is a list of general requirements for admission to the best MBA programs in Maharashtra: A bachelor's degree or its equivalent from an accredited university or other institution in any discipline is required of candidates, with a minimum cumulative GPA of 50%. Maharashtra has a large number of MBA schools that take into account the results of national entrance tests like the MAT, CAT, GMAT, XAT, CMAT, or MAH CET. It is necessary for candidates to achieve the minimum cutoff scores that each college has established.

mainEntity.name: What is fees for MBA in Maharashtra?

acceptedAnswer.text: NMIMS School of Business Management has the highest total tuition fee ranging between INR 8 Lacs - INR 24 lakh, while IIM Mumbai has the lowest total tuition fee of INR 9 lakh. ctp_tuple_6.questionText: What is fees for MBA in Maharashtra?
ctp_tuple_6.answerText:
NMIMS School of Business Management has the highest total tuition fee ranging between INR 8 Lacs - INR 24 lakh, while IIM Mumbai has the lowest total tuition fee of INR 9 lakh.

The table below shows the top colleges for an MBA in Maharashtra along with their total tuition fees:

College Name

Total Tuition Fee

NMIMS School of Business Management Admission

INR 8 Lacs – INR 24 lakh

Symbiosis Institute of Business Management Admission

INR 16 Lacs – INR 22 lakh

IIM Mumbai (formerly known as NITIE Admission

INR 9 lakh

S.P. Jain Institute of Management and Research Admission

INR 20 Lacs – INR 22 lakh

NMIMS Mumbai Admission

INR 10 lakh

ctp_tuple_6.questionText: Is it worth doing an MBA from MBA colleges in Maharashtra?
ctp_tuple_6.answerText:
Return on Investment (ROI) is a metric used to indicate how much money you will make or gain by attending a specific college. It evaluates the candidate's return on study fees and the return they receive in the form of job placements.

The top MBA programs in Maharashtra are displayed in the table below, along with the total cost of tuition and the average annual package:

ctp_tuple_4.questionText: What is the eligibility criteria to get admission to top MBA colleges in Maharashtra?
ctp_tuple_4.answerText:
The following is a list of general requirements for admission to the best MBA programs in Maharashtra:

  • A bachelor's degree or its equivalent from an accredited university or other institution in any discipline is required of candidates, with a minimum cumulative GPA of 50%.
  • Maharashtra has a large number of MBA schools that take into account the results of national entrance tests like the MAT, CAT, GMAT, XAT, CMAT, or MAH CET. It is necessary for candidates to achieve the minimum cutoff scores that each college has established.

ctp_tuple_3.questionText: Which are the best colleges for MBA in Maharashtra?
ctp_tuple_3.answerText:
Colleges are ranked annually by the National Institutional Ranking Framework (NIRF). Based on factors such as Infrastructure, Placements, Faculty, and other aspects of the college or university's success, the ranking is determined and varies year.

The top MBA Colleges in Maharashtra according to the NIRF rankings for 2021–2023 are displayed in the table below:

ctp_tuple_3.questionText: How many colleges for MBA in Maharashtra?
ctp_tuple_3.answerText: Maharashtra is home to 743 of the top MBA programs. Of these, 475 universities are privately held, 37 are owned by governmental or public entities, and 21 MBA colleges are controlled by a combination of public and private entities. The entrance examinations that top MBA schools in Maharashtra accept the most are CAT, CAT,6 MAH CET, MAT, XAT, and ATMA. Among the well-known MBA schools in Maharashtra are NMIMS School of Business Management, Symbiosis Institute of Business Management, National Institute of Industrial Engineering, S.P. Jain Institute of Management and Research, K J Somaiya Institute of Management, etc.

ctp_tuple_3.questionText: Which top MBA colleges in Maharashtra give admission through MAH CET?
ctp_tuple_3.answerText:
There are a total of 398 top MBA colleges in Maharashtra that give admission through MAH CET score. Out of which, some of them are mentioned below along with their total tuition costs:
